# CFXMLParserStatusCode

**Structure**

The various status and error flags that can be returned by the parser.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CFXMLParserStatusCode
```

## Overview

Parser status is determined by calling the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLParserGetStatusCode] function. The parser reports errors to your application by invoking the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFXMLParserHandleErrorCallBack] function.

## Constants

- **statusParseNotBegun**: Indicates the parser has not begun.
- **statusParseInProgress**: Indicates the parser is in progress.
- **errorUnexpectedEOF**: Indicates an unexpected EOF occurred.
- **errorUnknownEncoding**: Indicates an unknown encoding error.
- **errorEncodingConversionFailure**: Indicates an encoding conversion error.
- **errorMalformedProcessingInstruction**: Indicates a malformed processing instruction.
- **errorMalformedDTD**: Indicates a malformed DTD.
- **errorMalformedName**: Indicates a malformed name.
- **errorMalformedCDSect**: Indicates a malformed CDATA section.
- **errorMalformedCloseTag**: Indicates a malformed close tag.
- **errorMalformedStartTag**: Indicates a malformed start tag.
- **errorMalformedDocument**: Indicates a malformed document.
- **errorElementlessDocument**: Indicates a document containing no elements.
- **errorMalformedComment**: Indicates a malformed comment.
- **errorMalformedCharacterReference**: Indicates a malformed character reference.
- **errorMalformedParsedCharacterData**: Indicates malformed character data.
- **errorNoData**: Indicates a no data error.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **CFXMLParserOptions**: Options you can use to control the parser’s treatment of an XML document.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
